LPTX One other noteCrude Oil has collapsedcould very well be a harbinger of things to comeEconomy could possibly be in for a rough ride in the second half of 2019Here is the crude chartMy main concern here is what kind of environment will LPTX be releasing data intoAgain it is good to get this market selloff under our belts nowWith China Iran market concerns etc this should hopefully result in the Fed keeping rates from rising for awhile in my opinionAll in all we are in a low rate rate environment still in a strong bull marketI expect the Indexes to snap back later this year hopefully Again just my opinion

LPTX i know its a shitty day but theres hope no doubt as they 200D sma helps and is often where stocks revert back to before picking up the next leg of their run Yes I could totally wrong but Im not wrong yet Use this as a guide to help to decide if you want to add more or just hold I would say hold because the market is a disgusting disaster but I hope this helps someone whos wondering is this going to keep falling For now it is support at the pink line 200Day simpleMoving average or 200D sma

LPTX Its good that the market can get thru this funk now rather than when we release Q3 results hopefully Here is a daily chart of the S P500notice how we continue to extend our stay below the 20 Day Simple Moving Average Gold LineRegardless of the reason this is not good for stocks in general as Program Selling will continue in my opinion until signs that the market has stabilizedThere is also a good chance that the Indexes have entered a period of consolidationAll this said I trust that by JulyAugust the markets will hopefully have stabilized confirmed by the SP500 trading back above its Daily 20 SMAAgain all just my opinionMy hope is we have a stable indexes when we release our dataI have a hard time imagining LPTX finishing 2019 without either a Buyout Partnership and or Offering in my opinionClock is tickingMature Data being released in Q3Q4 imo Injection of Cash appears to be needed by Q2 2020 according to what has been reported
